long_description: Hit the mountain in the stylish 686 Reserved Avalon insulated jacket when the snow starts to fall. Featuring a longer cut, it keeps you warm and dry when you're conquering the slopes. Durable polyester fabric features INFIDRY-10(TM) waterproof breathable coating for superior wind and water protection; critical seams are taped. Body features 100g synthetic insulation for superior warmth without the bulk; 60g insulation in hood and sleeves. Smooth lining easily slides over base layers. Helmet-compatible, adjustable hood features a laminated brim to keep snowflakes at bay. Pit zippers let you vent body heat quickly. Longer length offers better coverage to powder seekers. Adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. 686 Reserved Avalon insulated jacket is rated to keep you warm from about -5degF to 32degF. Includes zippered handwarmer pockets; Street Fit cut is slim, but not too slim.
short_description: Hit the mountain in the stylish 686 Reserved Avalon insulated jacket when the snow starts to fall. Featuring a longer cut, it keeps you warm and dry when you're conquering the slopes.
